name: Misteryium
description:
FIND ALL THE SECRETS TO ESCAPE THE ABANDONED MANSION

A young explorer is now going to explore the most known abandoned mansion around the city. But this time things aren't the same. This particular mansion feels way different from any other than he had ever explored until.  He now finds himself locked and needs a code to escape from the mansion. The more he explores the stranger things become.

Maybe the rumours were more than that.

On January 21st, 2021,  discover all the secrets from the abandoned mansion in order to escape from it.

  • A narrative-driven, single-player puzzle game with a charming mysterious atmosphere.
  • Massive interactions with the environments that make you feel driven into the game.
  • Meticulously crafted puzzles that test your observation and focus skills.
  • Easy and accessible inputs!
Controls

The controls in this Vertical Slice are easy and accessible: simply interact with 'Z' and move. But with layers of exploration, these controls can do way more than you think at first.

The Studio

Misteryium was developed by Rio Studios for a college project- any generous contributions will go right towards making our future games more awesome!
